testcases.steps: Navigate to Students List → Observe In School column for active student
testcases.expected: Student active status is displayed with green tick icon

testcases.steps: Click green tick icon → Confirmation popup → Click Mark Inactive
testcases.expected: Student status changes from active to inactive (red X)

testcases.steps: Click green tick icon → Confirmation popup → Click Cancel
testcases.expected: Student status remains active with green tick

testcases.steps: Enter valid student name (Kayal) in search field
testcases.expected: Matching student records are displayed in the list

testcases.steps: Enter invalid student name (Shriya) in search field
testcases.expected: No records found message is displayed

testcases.steps: Select one or more student checkboxes → Click three dots (…) → Click Export
testcases.expected: Selected student data is exported successfully

testcases.steps: Click three dots (…) → Click Import → Upload valid student file
testcases.expected: Student data is imported successfully

testcases.steps: Click three dots (…) → Click Download
testcases.expected: Students list file is downloaded successfully

testcases.steps: Click +Add → Observe Student ID field
testcases.expected: Student ID is auto-generated and non-editable

testcases.steps: Enter all mandatory fields with valid data → Click Submit
testcases.expected: Student record is created successfully and shown in students list

testcases.steps: Enter all mandatory fields → Set status to Inactive → Click Submit
testcases.expected: Student record is created with inactive (red X) status

testcases.steps: Open Create Student page → Click Submit without entering data
testcases.expected: Validation error messages are displayed for required fields

testcases.scenario: Missing email and guardian contact validation
testcases.steps: Fill all mandatory fields except Email and Guardian Contact → Click Submit
testcases.expected: Validation errors are displayed for missing Email and Guardian Contact

testcases.steps: Enter invalid email format (abc.com) → Click Submit
testcases.expected: Invalid email format error message is displayed

testcases.steps: Enter invalid guardian contact number → Click Submit
testcases.expected: Invalid contact number validation error is displayed

testcases.steps: Open Nationality dropdown
testcases.expected: All nationality options are displayed correctly

testcases.steps: Select nationality → Open State dropdown
testcases.expected: All state options related to selected country are displayed

testcases.steps: Select state → Open City dropdown
testcases.expected: All city options related to selected state are displayed

testcases.steps: Open Grade/Class for Enrollment dropdown
testcases.expected: All grade/class options are displayed

testcases.steps: Open Section dropdown
testcases.expected: All section options (A, B, C, D) are displayed

testcases.steps: Select Male, Female, Others radio buttons
testcases.expected: Gender radio buttons selection works correctly

testcases.steps: Select YES and NO options for medical information
testcases.expected: Medical information radio button selection works correctly

testcases.steps: Open Students module in Mobile, Tablet, and Desktop resolutions
testcases.expected: Students module UI is responsive across all devices
